title: Craft and Use a Lantern in Minecraft: Step-by-Step Guide

steps.title: Gather the required materials.
steps.content: Gather the required materials. Lanterns are a great light source and decoration. They have a light level of 15 (the highest level). For reference, torches are at a 14. Soul lanterns are a variant with a dimmer, turquoise light at level 10 â€” they also repel piglins! You'll need two ingredients to craft a lantern: [1] X Research source 1 torch or 1 soul torch: You can make regular torches using sticks and coal . To make a soul torch, you'll need soul soil or soul sand from the Nether. [2] X Research source 8 iron nuggets: Place 1 iron ingot in the crafting menu to yield 9 iron nuggets. [3] X Research source

steps.title: Open the crafting menu.
steps.content: Open the crafting menu. Once you have the required materials, you're ready to start crafting! [4] X Research source

steps.title: Place the torch in the center slot.
steps.content: Place the torch in the center slot. In the 3 by 3 crafting menu, put the torch directly in the center. Use a soul torch instead to make a soul lantern. The soul lantern has a weaker light at light level 10, but it also repels piglins.

steps.title: Place the 8 iron nuggets around the torch.
steps.content: Place the 8 iron nuggets around the torch. The iron nuggets should make up every side of the 3 by 3 crafting menu now. The lantern will appear in the item slot to the right of the crafting menu.

steps.title: Click the lantern.
steps.content: Click the lantern. This will place the newly crafted lantern into your inventory. You're ready to place the lantern on a tree , near your house, or in your underground base. Lanterns can be placed on a block or they can hang from a ceiling. When placed on a block, the lantern will have a handle. When placed on the ceiling, the lantern will have a chain connecting it to the block above it.

steps.title: Find a lantern naturally.
steps.content: Find a lantern naturally. Lanterns spawn in a variety of places! You're likely to find a few while playing Minecraft . You can find them in snowy tundra villages and bastion remnants. Soul lanterns sometimes appear in ancient cities. [5] X Research source

steps.title: Trade with a librarian.
steps.content: Trade with a librarian. A village librarian (apprentice-level) sometimes sells lanterns for one emerald.

steps.title: Get a lantern from the creative menu.
steps.content: Get a lantern from the creative menu. While in creative mode , search for "lantern" in the search bar at the top of the creative inventory menu to find the lantern.

steps.title: Type /give lantern in the chat.
steps.content: Type /give lantern in the chat. Typing this command in the chat will place a lantern in your inventory.
